name: SUMMIT (bortimeer)
description:
SUMMIT

A 2D game about climbing...  Work your way to the top with only your arms to give yourself leverage as obstacles get in your way.  Perseverance is your only ally in this challenge and you'll be damned  if you let this mountain take that from you.

"Q" and "E" allow you to adjust your arms to the position of your mouse.

It's recommended to hold down "Q" or "E" one at a time while moving your mouse.

"A" and "D" move your climber left and right in the world to adjust your bodies position

Placing one of your hands above the rocks gets you in position to climb.

Once in position to climb, hold down "Q" OR "E" as well as hold down "Left Mouse Button" and drag your cursor down to launch yourself upward.

Making sure most of your body weight is above the rock before launching yourself upward and the slower you drag your mouse down, the better the result is.
